title: Change Target Size mode tab background color (Image Resize)

requirements.text: Update the Image Resize mode tabs so that the "Target Size" tab uses a different background color styling than the "By Pixels" and "By Percentage" tabs (especially for the active state), while keeping the tab labels as "By Pixels", "By Percentage", and "Target Size".

quotes:
By Pixels
By Percentage
Target Size button background color change it

acceptanceCriteria: In the Image Resize options UI, the tab labeled "Target Size" has a visibly different background color style than the other two tabs (at minimum when selected/active).
The tab labels remain in English exactly as: "By Pixels", "By Percentage", and "Target Size".
Only the styling of the tabs is changed; resize behavior and validation logic remain unchanged.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components must be composed, not edited).
Do not modify frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change image resizing algorithms, validation rules, or default values.
Do not add new resize modes or remove existing modes.
